pullRequest.title: Add account-level prebid cache success/error and creative size metrics
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR replaces existing prebid cache interaction metrics with the following:

prebid_cache.requests.ok
prebid_cache.requests.err
prebid_cache.creative_size
account.<account-id>.prebid_cache.requests.ok
account.<account-id>.prebid_cache.requests.err
account.<account-id>.prebid_cache.creative_size

Please see docs/metrics.md for detailed description of new metrics.

commit.message: Add account-level prebid cache success/error metrics
Add cached creative size histogram metric
Rename Prebid Cache metrics to follow hierarchical structure

nodes.bodyText: Can we use createPrefix() method instead of duplicating string?
